scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/test cargo test -- --nocapture
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zome && hc app pack workdir/happ --recursive
scripts.docs:setup: npm run -w @holochain-open-dev/profiles build && npm run -w @holochain-open-dev/profiles analyze && cp ui/custom-elements.json site/public
scripts.docs:start: npm run docs:setup && NODE_DEBUG=engine:rendering rocket start --open
scripts.docs:preview: npm run docs:setup && rocket build && rocket preview --open
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:setup && rocket build && gh-pages --dotfiles -d ./_site -b gh-pages
